content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Boiler at position(-4.5, 25.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -4.5, 25.0) with warnings: out of fuel, no input liquid, no fluid present in connections
- Pipe (position -6.5, 23.5)
- Pipe (position -5.5, 23.5)
- Pipe (position -4.5, 23.5)
- Character (position -3.5, 26.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing a steam engine
- Ensure that the position where you are trying to place the steam engine is not overlapping with water. Check the surroundings before placing the entity.

### Errors when trying to access an entity not in inventory
- Make sure to check your inventory for the required entities before attempting to use them. If an entity is not available, gather the necessary materials to craft or acquire it.
